name: FormattedText
desc: The object for specifying formatted text content and styling for captions in table cells.

items.name: additions
items.desc: An array of addition objects that supply additional information for ranges of text in the text property.This property is ignored when format is set to html.

items.name: format
items.desc: The formatting or markup method applied to the text. If format is set to html, neither additions nor inlineTextStyles is supported.

items.name: inlineTextStyles
items.desc: An array specifying ranges of characters and a TextStyle object to apply to each range.This property is ignored when format is set to html.

items.name: text
items.desc: The text, including any HTML tags.

items.name: textStyle
items.desc: Either a component text style object, or the name string of one of your styles in the ArticleDocument.componentTextStyles object.
